ModMetaData.name: No Lung Rot
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Removes lung rot from the game. This mod is recommended for large colonies that don't have a way to manage rot stink without micro-management hell, until and unless the developers make some changes.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ If you enjoy my work and want to support me and my family, I take donations at: https://ko-fi.com/1trickpwnyta +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
